description: McSium is a magnesium fertilizer containing Magnesium Sulphate with 9.5% Mg and 12.5% S. Essential for chlorophyll formation and proper plant growth.
application_rates: 3-6 Kg / Bigha (33 decimal); 4-8 Kg / Bigha (33 decimal); 200-300 gm / Tree; Both before and after sowing/transplanting it can be used as broadcast.
frequency_of_use: Apply 1-2 times during growing season, preferably during vegetative growth stage
side_effect: Generally safe for plants and environment. Use protective equipment during application. Store away from children and animals.
crops_pests: Rice, Wheat & Maize; Potato, Chili, Tomato, Brinjal, Potol, Cabbages, Cauliflowers etc.; Mango, Banana, Jackfruit, Papaya and others fruits.
crops: Rice, Wheat, Maize, Potato, Chili, Tomato, Brinjal, Potol, Cabbages, Cauliflowers, Mango, Banana, Jackfruit, Papaya
symptoms: Yellowing between leaf veins, stunted growth, poor fruit development, reduced chlorophyll production
causes: Magnesium deficiency in soil affecting chlorophyll formation and plant growth
